title: Down to 3 Southern Leaguers for set
author: okie

posts.post_title: Down to 3 Southern Leaguers for set
posts.post_content:
Greetings all,

New member to this forum, I am looking to buy the remaining 3 T206 cards I need for my SL set.  Piedmont or OM back is fine, looking for raw or 1.5 to 3 condition.  I need the following:

Manion
McCauley
Shag

I also would be looking to trade up or buy ones which I already own, but aren't in good shape.  I am fine with poor back condition if the front is presentable.  Particularly, I am looking for Rockenfeld, Persons, Seitz, and Bay.

Thanks for the help. 

Will
Good luck Will! Welcome to the board and I'm hoping you can make some progress here.
Checked three more off the list thanks to Josh.  4 left.
THanks to some members here I am at 4. Thanks again. Not looking for anything high grade.

Cool that new Members collecting the Monster are still out there.
Welcome Will.
RayB
Thanks all!  The tobacco card community is definitely awesome.
